name: Smooch Bot + Wit.AI App
description: Smooch Bot example using Express integrating with Wit.AI

SMOOCH_APP_TOKEN.description: Your Smooch app token which is used to initialize the web widget.

SMOOCH_KEY_ID.description: Your Smooch key ID, used to talk to the Smooch API

SMOOCH_SECRET.description: Your Smooch secret, used to talk to the Smooch API
